overview: Flip Flop: verb - to be versatile, to give as good as one gets.  Coverboy Andre Lopes proves he is equally adept at pitching and catching in Flip Flop 2. See Andre, Sam Robins, Lewis Grant, Michael Getlin, Ronyor Patricio, Tom Hawai, Kenny Jacobs, and Camil Tucker each Flip Flop for each other and for your pleasure. Life is short, why limit yourself!
title: Flip Flop 2: No Holds Barred
